sub_title: Industrial Engineer, Quality Management Systems Auditor, MSc in Occupational Risk Prevention
summary:
I am Quality Management Systems ISO 9001 auditor, with more than 10 years of experience in planning, implementation, maintenance and auditing of management systems, in several companies and economic sectors.

I have designed and implemented processes based on ISO IEC 17025 for calibration laboratories.

I am a quality technical conditions controller in healthcare companies, based on standards and recommendations of the World Health Organization (WHO) and Colombian laws.
I am a leading woman, with analytical, proactive, objective, methodical attitude, adaptable to different organizations working environments with interdisciplinary and intercultural groups.
